xml.iw_desktop_client_desc:
Desktop Client stands as a replacement of Microsoft Outlook for email, groupware and instant messaging.
Note - On Windows XP install Microsoft .Net Framework 2.0 prior to installing Desktop Client.
xml.iw_desktop_client_about: A complete suite of productivity web applications
xml.iw_outlook_sync_desc: Outlook Sync is needed to use sharing and other advanced features of Microsoft Outlook 2010, 2013, 2016, 2019
xml.iw_outlook_sync_about: Manage your account settings directly from Outlook
xml.iw_notifier_desc: Notifier integrates the IceWarp WebClient as the default Windows mail client and provides email notification.
xml.iw_notifier_about: Get informed about new emails instantly as they arrive
xml.webadmin_desc: Web-based interface for system and domain administrators.
xml.internet_calendar_desc: Manually import your calendar into Microsoft Outlook or other calendar clients that support .ics (iCalendar) format (Google Calendar, Windows Calendar).
xml.basic_calendar_desc: Allow other people to view your public calendar directly in browser.
xml.freebusy_desc: Your Free/Busy information can be used by external users (with Outlook, Thunderbird) when sending meeting invitations, to determine when you are available.
xml.webdav_desc: WebFolders provide a shared storage for files, e.g. for collaborative editing and management of documents. Calendaring applications use it to connect to your calendar.
xml.copyright: Copyright © 1999-%Y% IceWarp Ltd. All rights reserved.
xml.useful_tools: Useful tools for improving your workflow
xml.icewarp_access_helper: Below you can find useful links to IceWarp online tools and configuration links that can be set up in 3rd party applications.
xml.useful_utilities: Find useful utilities for preparing the best experience.
